ygData.subject: Padding fitness?
ygData.msgSnippet: For my experiment, I have positive and negative contributions to my fitness function.  After a few iterations, I noticed that NEAT does not like fitness values

Subject: Padding fitness?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=469058923; y=RrOVfaAHD0xGW-LPzIQv0IvmzHosvf5R67fG6IBq6yXYLw
X-Yahoo-Profile: garrerc

For my experiment, I have positive and negative contributions to my fitness=
 function.  After a few iterations, I noticed that NEAT does not like fitne=
ss values less than 0.000001 (1e-6).  I feel like I may be losing informati=
on if I simply clip things at this value.  What would be the effect of simp=
ly padding the fitness with some large value?  Would there be any ill effec=
ts?
